eppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Metadata.sol":{"keccak256":"0x70f2f713b13b7ce4610bcd0ac9fec0f3cc43693b043abcb8dc40a42a726eb330","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c13d13304ac79a83ab1c30168967d19e2203342ebbd6a9bbce4db7550522dcbf","dweb:/ipfs/QmeN5jKMN2vw5bhacr6tkg78afbTTZUeaacNHqjWt4Ew1r"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"src/Interfaces/IAToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x043c56cd1ef307bc0ba63d610b83af1ea12e753589804e1d77ad15b6f06cfab0","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f1560537b26b96228ad871d3f08b5a44aed3066e1d1273a4e4ed4583187622a6","dweb:/ipfs/QmTbgfWXM1wYRqT3nDGh5ZFcS3r2BXG2sWZJ9RXKEr54KW"]},"src/Interfaces/ILendingPool.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb7e0b1f184fb8614081bed44fa40bd3536880b87cdcfeca9f847c7c3d9647abc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5f6364d01d158fea400d782883838b866dcc15cfecd19e24548618fe4ca99e73","dweb:/ipfs/QmauxBdDfQSS4HjpvC9UgL2ggmPPH94WCVwuw4WoyNLqY6"]},"src/Tokens/AToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0xad15b610e45d411a6835ee467b1f0b70c010631a96eee5f75bebaaab7ba1363e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0ac1514dc537b992ebdaa1b21e7e63a0e645679d7a2bbcc1e45c135a5052c2e7","dweb:/ipfs/QmNhiHo3AY3NqyaBihQdRmfHbq67RyV3jobvAbWp2NjJYC"]}},"version":1}

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. NOTE: If `value` is the maximum `uint256`, the allowance is not updated on `transferFrom`. This is semantically equivalent to an infinite approval. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

params.account: 要查询余额的账户地址。

returns._0: 其持有的aToken代表的底层资产数量。

params._amountToWithdrawInUnderlying: 用户希望取出的底层资产数量。
params._liquidityIndexAtTimeOfBurn: 取款操作时（调用_updateState后）的流动性指数。
params._user: 持有 aToken 并发起取款的用户地址。

returns.burnedScaledAmount: 实际销毁的缩放单位的aToken数量。

params.tokenName: aToken的名称 (例如 "Aave Interest bearing DAI")。

decimals().details: 返回 aToken 的小数位数，与底层资产一致。

params._amountInUnderlying: 用户存入的底层资产数量。
params._liquidityIndexAtTimeOfMint: 存款操作时（调用_updateState后）的流动性指数。
params._user: 接收 aToken 的用户地址。

returns.mintedScaledAmount: 实际铸造的缩放单位的aToken数量。

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

returns._0: 用户持有的 aToken 代表的缩放单位数量。

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `to` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `value`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Skips emitting an {Approval} event indicating an allowance update. This is not required by the ERC. See {xref-ERC20-_approve-address-address-uint256-bool-}[_approve]. NOTE: Does not update the allowance if the current allowance is the maximum `uint256`. Requirements: - `from` and `to` cannot be the zero address. - `from` must have a balance of at least `value`. - the caller must have allowance for ``from``'s tokens of at least `value`.

LENDING_POOL().notice: 返回关联的 LendingPool 地址。

balanceOf(address).notice: 返回指定账户的当前余额（已计利息的底层资产单位）。

burn(address,uint256,uint256).notice: 销毁用户的 aToken (只能由 LendingPool 调用)。

getScaledTotalSupply().notice: 返回 aToken 的总缩放供应量。

mint(address,uint256,uint256).notice: 铸造 aToken 给用户 (只能由 LendingPool 调用)。

scaledBalanceOf(address).notice: 返回用户的缩放余额 (scaled balance)。

totalSupply().notice: 返回aToken的总供应量（已计利息的底层资产单位）。
